actions.description: The balhannoth makes one Bite attack and two Tentacle attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 19 (3d10 + 3) piercing damage.
actions.name: Bite

actions.description: 7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 15) and is moved up to 5 feet toward the balhannoth. Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the balhannoth can't use this tentacle against other targets. The balhannoth has four tentacles.
actions.name: Tentacle

actions.description: The balhannoth makes one Bite attack against one creature it has grappled.
actions.name: Bite

actions.description: The balhannoth teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying and any creatures it has grappled, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.
actions.name: Teleport

actions.description: The balhannoth magically becomes invisible for up to 10 minutes or until immediately after it makes an attack roll.
actions.name: Vanish

specialTraits.description: If the balhannoth fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.
specialTraits.name: Legendary Resistance (2/Day)
